results.title: Anti-inflammatory effect of simvastatin by impeding TNF-alpha and interleukin-1ss pathways: antiangiogenic activity of simvastatin and simvastatin-loaded silver nanoparticles.
results.text_hl: Cotton-pellet induced @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006099 @@@granuloma@@@ model study showed that high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@ produced comparable (p < 0.05) anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect.

citations.NLM: Buabeid M, Arafa EA, Yaseen HS, Umar MI, Murtaza G. Anti-inflammatory effect of simvastatin by impeding TNF-alpha and interleukin-1ss pathways: antiangiogenic activity of simvastatin and simvastatin-loaded silver nanoparticles. Artif Cells Nanomed Biotechnol. 2022 Dec;50(1):208-217. PMID: 35866995

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on inflammatory cytokines balance in air pouch granuloma model.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokines balance in @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006099 @@@air pouch granuloma@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Hassan HM, Al-Gayyar MM, El-Gayar AM, Ibrahim TM. Effect of simvastatin on inflammatory cytokines balance in air pouch granuloma model. Inflamm Allergy Drug Targets. 2014 Feb;13(1):74-9. PMID: 24372369

results.title: Simvastatin improves wound strength after intestinal anastomosis in the rat.
results.text_hl: Histopathological analysis revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration leads to a better anastomotic healing in terms of reepithelialization, decreased @<m>DISEASE_Granuloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006099 @@@granuloma@@@ formation, reduced @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @DISEASE_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ infiltration to muscle layer.

citations.NLM: Karadeniz Cakmak G, Irkorucu O, Ucan BH, Emre AU, Bahadir B, Demirtas C, Tascilar O, Karakaya K, Acikgoz S, Kertis G, Ankarali H, Pasaoglu H, Comert M. Simvastatin improves wound strength after intestinal anastomosis in the rat. J Gastrointest Surg. 2009 Sep;13(9):1707-16. PMID: 19578821
